Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at Balbo/Michigan
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at Hyde Park/54th
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses temp. rerouted EB: Garfield, Lake Park, 56th & Hyde Park; WB: Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and Garfield due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Hyde Park/54th, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Garfield, Lake Park, 56th & Hyde Park.

Westbound buses will operate via Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and Garfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses rerouted EB 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Lake Shore Drive, 67th & Bennett: WB 67th, Stony Island & 64th due to blockage near 63rd/Stony Island

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Lake Shore Drive, 67th & Bennett.

Westbound buses will operate via 67th, Stony Island & 64th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Diversey. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Diversey.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
